perturbation.original_text: 1. License - Individual grants Lifeway together with its affiliates, subsidiaries, parent companies and their representatives and employees have an unlimited, perpetual, non-exclusive, worldwide and, except as set forth in Section 9, royalty-free, right to use, reuse, publish, reproduce, perform, copy, create derivative works, exhibit, broadcast, and display throughout the world the name, image and likeness of Individual in Marketing Materials (as defined below) in connection with marketing, advertising or otherwise promoting the Lifeway products and/or services and for historical reference and display purposes and other internal purposes, including without limitation, internal sales meetings.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. License - Individual grants Lifeway together with its affiliates, subsidiaries, parent companies and their representatives and employees have an unlimited, time-limited, non-exclusive, worldwide and, except as set forth in Section 9, royalty-free, right to use, reuse, publish, reproduce, perform, copy, create derivative works, exhibit, broadcast, and display throughout the world the name, image and likeness of Individual in Marketing Materials (as defined below) in connection with marketing, advertising or otherwise promoting the Lifeway products and/or services and for historical reference and display purposes and other internal purposes, including without limitation, internal sales meetings.
perturbation.explanation: The term "perpetual" is changed to "time-limited," which directly contradicts the common understanding of 'perpetual' as never-ending and introduces uncertainty in the duration of the license granted. The law generally defines 'perpetual' as lasting forever.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Definition of Perpetual Rights

perturbation.original_text: 9. Compensation (a) In consideration of the rights granted by Individual hereunder, Lifeway agrees to pay Individual a royalty (the "Royalty") equal to $0.02 for each Lifeway product or individual item sold by Lifeway during each calendar month of the Term bearing Individual's first name, last name or other identifying personal characteristics; provided, however, the Royalty will cease being paid upon the death of Individual. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Royalty will not exceed $50,000 in any month.
perturbation.changed_text: 9. Compensation (a) In consideration of the rights granted by Individual hereunder, Lifeway agrees to potentially pay Individual a variable compensation (the "Royalty") based on Lifeway's discretion for each Lifeway product or individual item sold by Lifeway during each calendar month of the Term bearing Individual's first name, last name or other identifying personal characteristics; provided, however, the Royalty will cease being paid upon the death of Individual. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Royalty may or may not exceed $50,000 in any month.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the definite "Royalty equal to $0.02" to a "variable compensation based on Lifeway's discretion" introduces ambiguity and contradicts the initial statement of a fixed royalty. Also, changing 'will not exceed' to 'may or may not exceed' makes the compensation terms uncertain.

perturbation.original_text: 15. Choice of Law and Forum - This Agreement will be construed and governed in accordance with the laws of the State of Illinois, without regard to conflict of laws principles.
perturbation.changed_text: 15. Choice of Law and Forum - This Agreement will be construed and governed in accordance with the laws of a state chosen at Lifeway's discretion, with regard to conflict of laws principles.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the specified 'State of Illinois' to a state chosen at Lifeway's discretion creates uncertainty and conflicts with typical choice of law provisions, potentially making enforcement unpredictable. Contract law mandates clarity.
